bibl.title: Five Leases of the Roman Period.
bibl.note: 1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 685. Lease of a house (Oxyrhynchus, 29 (30) August 157-160 or 180-188). - 2. Inv. 1224. Lease of rooms (?) (Oxyrhynchite?, 15 Feb. - 26 Mar. 163). - 3. Inv. 962. Sublease of a palm grove (Ptolemais Euergetis, second century). - 4. Inv. 696. Lease of agricultural land (Oxyrhynchus, 230/31 or 262/3). - 5. Inv. 1257. Top of a misthapoche (Oxyrhynchite, IV/V).
bibl.seg: BENAISSA Amin, Five Leases of the Roman Period.

1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 685. Lease of a house (Oxyrhynchus, 29 (30) August 157-160 or 180-188). - 2. Inv. 1224. Lease of rooms (?) (Oxyrhynchite?, 15 Feb. - 26 Mar. 163). - 3. Inv. 962. Sublease of a palm grove (Ptolemais Euergetis, second century). - 4. Inv. 696. Lease of agricultural land (Oxyrhynchus, 230/31 or 262/3). - 5. Inv. 1257. Top of a misthapoche (Oxyrhynchite, IV/V).
